snippet: The decision is a reversal of the government’s approach to supporting scientific efforts to intensify viruses, called gain of function.
abstract: Obama administration temporarily halts all new funding for experiments that seek to study certain infectious agents by using research strategy known as gain of function, which purposely makes the viruses more dangerous in effort to learn about mutations; moratorium applies only to research on influenza virus and on coronaviruses that cause SARS and MERS.
lead_paragraph: The decision is a reversal of the government’s approach to supporting scientific efforts to intensify viruses, called gain of function.
